it.polimi.se2019.server.model

Class Weapon

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.server.model.Card
      • it.polimi.se2019.server.model.Weapon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable, Grabbable, Jsonable

    public class Weapon
extends Card
implements Grabbable, Drawable, Jsonable
    This class implements the weapons created dynamically through the WeaponHandler WeaponHelper. A weapon can either be loaded or not and, being both a card and an object that can be grabbed, it implements both Grabbable and Drawable.

      • grab

        public void grab(Player player,
                 String grabbed,
                 Game game)
        Checks whether the number of weapons in hand is less than 3. If that is true, the cost of the grab is payed and the weapon is added to the weapons owned.
        Specified by:
        grab in interface Grabbable
        Parameters:
        player - the player grabbing.
        grabbed - the weapon they wish to grab.
        game -
